name: Yahoo! Wide BlackForest
description:
[2009.February.07] Now that the login issue is resolved, I should have access to this and the rest of my styles. I would like to know how many of you are using this style with the NASA Night Launch Theme (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/4908) for Firefox?

[2008 October 1] I am sorry for my long absence. I have been without a decent computer for almost a year. By decent, I mean one that would (have a powerful enough processor and large memory space, to) allow me to run Firefox (with all of the tabs open as needed to verify changes in my code). I have now built a completely new machine, after having had numerous machine failures in this past year. I am now attempting to recover from this protracted period of inactivity. So now, hopefully the request below will continue to apply. Again, I'm sorry. But life is often contrary to our desires.

I NEED FEEDBACK FOLKS!!!    CONSTANTLY CHECK FOR UPDATES!!!

As a further note, most of my time is spent on Yahoo! Answers. So most development goes there. The rest has been secondary for me. If you need something specific that I've not included, let me know.

Here are some sample images of this style.

http://img179.imageshack.us/img179/1843/yahoowideblackforest14yg1.png << Yahoo!'s main page. ||| http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/9725/yahoowideblackforest15zp2.png << Yahoo! Answers
http://img475.imageshack.us/img475/9625/yahoowideblackforest16uy8.png << Yahoo! Answers, responses http://img459.imageshack.us/img459/4340/yahoowideblackforest18nd0.png << Yahoo Answers, scoring
http://img187.imageshack.us/img187/2342/yahoowideblackforest17fa2.png << Yahoo! Answers, question list
http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/7571/yahoowideblackforest3pe7.png << Yahoo! Answers Email page ||| http://img106.imageshack.us/img106/9172/yahoowideblackforest8yt0.png << Yahoo! Answers Profile Page
http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/6460/yahoowideblackforest9je7.png << Yahoo! Groups main page ||| 

More are coming!

Please contact me as Shingoshi Gmail.com

Xavian-Anderson Macpherson
Shingoshi/shingoshidao

Latest version:
2007.Dec.10 Mon, 02:58 --800 (PST) >> Minor fixes.
2007.Dec.05 Wed, 04:32 --800 (PST) >> Increased the height of the text boxes for answering and questions.
2007.Dec.02 Sun, 10:04 --800 (PST) >> More fixes to Yahoo! Groups.
2007.Nov.30 Fri, 17:38 --800 (PST) >> Fixes to Groups' colors.
2007.Nov.22 Thu, 01:38 --800 (PST) >> Minor cosmetic fix of user's picture border on profile page. (Yahoo! Answers)
2007.Nov.13 Tue, 23:20 --800 (PST) >> No more annoying white bar at top of inbox.
2007.Nov.13 Tue, 10:56 --800 (PST) >> Corrected that awful white background in the mail inbox.
2007.Nov.08 Thu, 22:43 --800 (PST) >> Flag borders are now green, not the blinding white!
2007.Nov.08 Thu, 13:09 --800 (PST) >> Minor background annoyances removed.
2007.Nov.04 Sun, 01:46 --700 (PDT) >> Remove Yahoo! Search Results Ads
2007.Nov.02 Fri, 05:24 --700 (PDT) >> Yahoo! Answers, report flags are now RED!!
2007.Nov.01 Thu, 11:51 --700 (PDT) >> More cosmetic fixes for Yahoo! Answers.
2007.Oct.29 Mon, 20:16 --700 (PDT) >> Yahoo! 360 fixes.
2007.Oct.26 Fri, 22:09 --700 (PDT) >> Just a few more fixes.
2007.Oct.25 Thu, 17:49 --700 (PDT) >> Yahoo! 360 background fix.
2007.Oct.14 Sun, 13:52 --700 (PDT) >> Yahoo! Search errors hopefully (some) are corrected.
2007.Oct.07 Sun, 21:46 --700 (PDT) >> Updated image for Yahoo! main page.
2007.Oct.07 Sun, 14:52 --700 (PDT) >> Starting to fix Yahoo! weather.yahoo.com
2007.Oct.07 Sun, 14:11 --700 (PDT) >> Starting to fix Yahoo! astrology.yahoo.com
2007.Oct.07 Sun, 07:21 --700 (PDT) >> Starting to fix Yahoo! local.yahoo.com
2007.Oct.05 Fri, 14:50 --700 (PDT) >> Fixing incompatible overlaps of Yahoo! Answers, 360 and Groups backgrounds.
2007.Oct.04 Thu, 22:19 --700 (PDT) >> A few things I missed on pages I don't often use. I know there must be more though.
2007.Oct.01 Mon, 14:00 --700 (PDT) >> Fixes for Yahoo! Groups.
2007.Oct.01 Mon, 10:40 --700 (PDT) >> More font/background issues corrected.
2007.Sep.30 Sun, 23:31 --700 (PDT) >> Hopefully some cleaner code! I'm still missing those garish light green buttons!
2007.Sep.29 Sat, 19:09 --700 (PDT) >> You better have a BIG monitor to use this! Did I say WIDE!!!
2007.Sep.29 Sat, 12:23 --700 (PDT) >> Some more corrections made. Too many to list!
2007.Sep.28 Fri, 12:10 --700 (PDT) >> More interface corrections. Even darker green backgrounds on more blacks!
2007.Sep.28 Fri, 00:13 --700 (PDT) >> Yahoo! Answers edit menu is now a dark green background.
2007.Sep.27 Thu, 05:21 --700 (PDT) >> All visited links are now a more visible Deep Orange.
2007.Sep.26 Wed, 17:45 --700 (PDT) >> All active links are now Dark Yellow!
2007.Sep.25 Tue, 08:07 --700 (PDT) >> Yahoo! 360 fixes.
2007.Sep.22 Sat, 16:51 --700 (PDT) >> Yahoo! Mail fixes.
2007.Sep.21 Fri, 17:00 --700 (PDT) >> Further interface enhancements and cleanup.
2007 Sep.18 Tue, 12:44 --700 (PDT)
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
/*=======================================*/
/* Yahoo! Wide BlackForest */
/* Xavian-Anderson Macpherson */
/* http://userstyles.org/users/3665 */
/* Shingoshi@Gmail.com */
/* NASA Night Launch Specific Modifications */
/* https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/4908 */
/*=======================================*/
@-moz-document domain("yahoo.com"),
               domain("answers.yahoo.com") {

/*=======================================*/
/* Display None */
/*
#content,
#bestofanswerscontent,
#bestofanswerscontent .roundoff,
#just-middle,
.connections_right,

*/
.ads,
.doc-layout-head a img,
.ovt,
.yschbox,
.yshp_ad ,
.yshp_ad_header,
.yshp_ad_o_e,
.yshp_ad_o_e .link,
.yshp_ad_o_e img,
.yshp_ad_o_e u,
.yshp_ad_o_e ,
.yshp_ad_o_e ,

#ad-content,
#y-ks-banner,
#y-ks-mini-banner,
#yschsec,

html > body > a > img,
html > body > table > tbody > tr > td > iframe,
html > body > table > tbody > tr > td > a > img,

[class="ad"],
[class="ad_slug"],
[class="ad_slug"] img,
[class="ad_slug_table"],
[class="ad_slug_tube"],
[class="marketing-ad mod"],
[class="ygrp-mon"],

[id="ad"],
[id='errorPageContainer'],
[id="H2_div"],
[id="H3_div"],
[id="LREC"],
[id="swPane"],
[id="welcomeAdsContainer"],
[id="yan-banner"],
[id="yan-sponsored"],
[id="ygma"] table,
[id="ymgl-north-wrapper"],
[id="ypfl-links"],
[id="ypfl-lrec-ad"]
 {
 display: none !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Images Preferred */

ul.user-profile-image-area
 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 background-color: transparent !important;
 border-left-color: #020 !important;
 border-right-color: #020 !important;
 border-bottom-color: #020 !important;
 border-right-color: #020 !important;
 font-weight: normal !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Clear Skies */
.forecast-module #forecast-temperature ul li,
.forecast-module #forecast-temperature ul li a
 {
 color: #000 !important;
 background-color: transparent !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
[class="inputtext"]
 {
 background-color: #9a9 !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* FlagHoles */
[class="answer low-rating"],
[class="answer-util disabled"]
 {
 background-color: #300 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Light Gray/Global Text */
*,

#management-nav ul li,
#patabs li .icon strong,
#patabs li a.details b,
#patabs li.tab-on a.details b,
#patabs ul.patabs li,
#today p,
#weatherpreview dd,
#weatherpreview .high strong,
#weatherpreview .low strong,
#yan-edit-question a,
#yan-starthis a span, #yan-starthis .cannot-star span,
#ygma *,
#ygrp_join_grp h3,
#ygunav strong,
#ymgl-masthead h1 span strong,
#yls-gl-neighborhood h4,
#yschres .yschspns li em,
#yschres .yschurl,

.caption em,
.form-sub-label,
.ft-content .rating-readonly,
.headerControl,
.inputtext,
.join_grp_prefs,
.messageSubject,
.p-tip,
.qsfl span,
.rating-area .rating.negative span,
.rating-area .rating.positive span,
.s2,
.settings *,
.submit,
.ulmform #csz,
.ulmform input,
.ulmform label,

h1, h2, h3, h4,
iframe,
textarea,
A, P,

[class="caption"],
[class="char-count"],
[class="col-2 settings body-regular"],
[class="contTableResizerHotspot eResizeCursor"],
[class="ct"] strong,
[class="cut"],
[class="forcast"],
[class="high"],
[class="icon"],
[class="h1-regular"],
[class="fn"],
[class="level"],
[class="low"],
[class="memberwritten-regular link-1"],
[class="minor"],
[class="p-tip minor-regular"],
[class="snippet"] strong,
[class="star-count has-stars"],
[class="textLink"],
[class="time"],
[class="timestamp"],
[class="title"],
[class="ygrp-act"],
[class="ygrp-remaining"],
[class="yschurl"] b,

[id="0_shortcutson_label"],
[id="localulm"],
[id="messages_checkall"],
[id="messages_clearall"],
[id="Name_hdr"],
[id="searchp"],
[id="signout"],
[id="ygma"],
[id="ygmacx"],
[id="ygmagreeting"] #strong,
[id="ygrmgrtlinks"]
 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Black Text */
#bar-answers-best,
#bar-answers-total, /* These are for the Answers profile page. */
#bar-questions-knowledge,
#bar-questions-open,

.forecast-module #forecast-temperature p,
.forecast-module dd,
.forecast-module dt,
.forecast-module em,
.forecast-module h3,

SPAN *,

[class="cta-ans-1"] *,
[class="rating negative"] *,
[class="rating positive"] *,
[class="starflagab-area"],
[class="txt"]
 {
 color: #000 !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Welcome User Name */
#ygma strong,

[class="best-answer-notify"],
[class="star-count-has-stars"],

[id="up-member-cur-level"],
[id="up-member-num-points"],
[id="up-member-points-text"],
[id="username"]
 {
 color: #9c9 !important;
 font-weight: bolder !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Assorted Link Handling */
a:hover, a:active { color: #0d0 !important}
a:visited { color: #f50 !important }
a:visited:hover { color: #ff3 !important; }

/* Yellow Links */
a:link,

[class="ygrp-add"] b,
[class="yshortcuts"]
 {
 color: #aa0 !important;
 }

/* Button Faces */
#mantle2 #mtl-btn,
#search .btn-more-2,
#ygma .ygbt,

button,
button.default,
container-0,
input.active,
input.button,

[class="alt-button"],
[class="btn-more-2"],
[class="button"],
[class="ygbt"],
[class="ygrp-button"],

[id="mtl-btn"]
 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 background-color: #020 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 border-color: #040 !important;
/* padding-left-value: 4px !important;
 padding-right-value: 4px !important;*/
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Answer this question */
[class="textlink"],
 [
 class="cta-ans-1"] *|*:link
 {
 color: #00d
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Reporting Yamster */
#yan-text--bubble .bd,
#yan-text--bubble .bd div,
#yan-text--bubble .bd span,
#yan-text--bubble .ft,
#yan-text--bubble h1,
#yan-text--bubble h2,
#yan-text--bubble p,
#yan-text--bubble ul,

[class="bd"],
[class="ft"],
[class="mod"],

[id="bd"],
[id="yan-community"],
[id="yan-text-bubble"]
 {
 background-color: #010 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Black Imageless Backgrounds */
/* , li, body, td, img */
FORM, HTML, TEXTAREA,

.action-area-menu .heading,
.folderRow, .form,
.hd li.on em,

#aubg,
#categories ul /*Y*/,
#swPane, .pane, .plaque,

body,
dl.formfields dd,
input,
select,
spacer,
table,
td,
textarea,

.answer-hidden,
.h2.header,
.messagepane,
.tabBar,

[class="hd cta-guidelines"]
{
 background-color: #000 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* #y-body-green-knowledge-search { background-color: #000 !important } */
[class="question-title"]
 {
 color: #ff3 !important;
 font-weight: bold !important;
 font-size: 200% !important;
 background-color: #000 !important
 }

/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* LightGreen Borders */
.profile-tabs ul li.selected a,
.promo h4,
.question-listing .attention a,

#trough

[class="action"],
[class="backinglframe"],
[class="c"],
[class="corner-top"],
[class="down"],
[class="icon"],
[class="l"],
[class="ls"],
[class="neoCheck neoCheck_off"],
[class="pa-alert-promo"],
[class="r"],
[class="rs"],
[class="selected"],

[id="buddylist"],
[id="doors-links"],
[id="musicpreview"],
[id="up-member-stats-border-right"],
[id="weatherpreview"]
 {
 color: #bb0 !important;
 background-color: #030 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 border-left-color: #020 !important;
 border-right-color: #020 !important;
 border-bottom-color: #000 !important;
 border-right-color: #000 !important;
 font-weight: normal !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
[class="star"]
 {
 background-color: #020 !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* DarkGreen Borders */
div.message-container,
dl.formfields dt,
tableHeadersWrapper,

.action-area-menu ul li a,
.corner-bottom,
.hd li.on,
.mail-friend a,
.md,
.panedivider,
.profile-tabs ul li a,
.profile-tabs ul li .left,
.profile-tabs ul li .right,
.sidebar-box,
.sidebar-box h2,
.site-tabs ul li,
.site-tabs ul li a,
.tabgraphic,
.wmod .bd,

#cat-undo,
#categories,
#doors li a,
#today .ft li.on a,
#y-ks-profile-widget,
#y-ks-profile-widget-container,
#yan-community form div div,
#yan-startthis a span, #yan-startthis .cannot-star span,
#ygma form,
#yls-hm-tabs,
#yls-hm-tabs .yui-content-child *,
#ymgl-inbox-menu .section .inbox li,
#ymgl-masthead h1 span,
#yan-save-question a,
#yui-main #yls-hm-main,

[class="action"],
[class="active"],
[class="active-undo"],
[class="avatar"],
[class="blast spoken"],
[class="body"],
[class="bottom"],
[class="cb"],
[class="container-0"],
[class="container-0 message"],
[class="container-1 tip"],
[class="corner-bottom"],
[class="corner-left"],
[class="corner-top"],
[class="content unset-html-style"] center > embed,
[class="ct"],
[class="delimiter"],
[class="description"],
[class="doors"],
[class="doors-links"],
[class="ft-content"],
[class="fixfloat"],
[class="hd tabs"],
[class="head"],
[class="header"],
[class="hide"],
[class="info"],
[class="invite-wrap"] table > tbody > tr > td > table > tbody > tr > td > div,
[class="invite-wrapper"],
[class="left"],
[class="list-foot"],
[class="middle"],
[class="mode"],
[class="msgTableHeaders"],
[class="network"],
[class="on"],
[class="option"],
[class="PagedTableView_cell"],
[class="PagedTableView_message"],
[class="pane emptyFolderView"],
[class="photo"],
[class="promo-item"],
[class="promo-item-last"],
[class="prop"],
[class="rating-area"],
[class="right"],
[class="section active"],
[class="section"],
[class="section last"],
[class="show"],
[class="site-tabs"],
[class="skyAdHide"],
[class="snippet"],
[class="stat-half"],
[class="user-profile-image-area"], ul.user-profile-image-area,
[class="vote-count"],
[class="xbd"],
[class="ygrp-tabbed-container"],
[class="ygrp-tabline"],
[class="yls-gl-palette1"],
[class="yui-b"],
[class="yui-content"],
[class="yui-content-child"],
[class="yui-gd"],

[id="boa"],
[id="boa-bottom"],
[id="boa-content"],
[id="boa-lshade"],
[id="boa-rshade"],
[id="boa-top"],
[id="contact-nav"],
[id="contactsListResizer"],
[id="content"],
[id="ks-stats-total-qcount"],
[id="marketplace"],
[id="mastheadbd"],
[id="messageHeader"],
[id="middle-right-container"],
[id="minimantle"],
[id="newsbd"],
[id="newsft"],
[id="newsTab_entertainment"],
[id="newsTab_sports"],
[id="newsTab_topstories"],
[id="newsTab_world"],
[id="patop"],
[id="popsearch"] .md,
[id="pulse"],
[id="saf_starrers_bottom_div"],
[id="saf-starrers-toggle-wrapper"],
[id="securityi"],
[id="test_go_button_label"],
[id="todaybd"],
[id="todayft"],
[id="y-ks-header"],
[id="y-ks-header-user-profile"],
[id="y-ks-profile-widget-container"],
[id="yan-comment-link"],
[id="yan-community-disclaimer"],
[id="yan-community-form-buttons"],
[id="yan-edit-question"],
[id="yan-starthis"],
[id="yan-reportthis"],
[id="ygmabot"],
[id="ygmatop"],
[id="yls-hm-best"],
[id="yls-hm-events"],
[id="yls-hm-tabs-wrap"],
[id="yls-gl-neighborhood"],
[id="yls-gl-neighlast"],
[id="yls-hm-buzz"],
[id="ymgl-inbox"],
[id="ymgl-inbox-menu"],
[id="ymgl-watch-confirm"],
[id="yui-main"]
 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 background-color: #020 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 border: 1px !important;
 border-left-color: #020 !important;
 border-right-color: #040 !important;
 border-bottom-color: #020 !important;
 border-right-color: #040 !important;
 font-weight: normal !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Green Flag Borders */
#y-ks-footer-intl-links table tr td a
 {
 border-color: #040 !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* BlackGreen Borders */
.artists,
.cb, .cl, .ct,
.my-from-question.even .answer form,
.other-questions li,
.yschspns ul,
.yui-g,

/*#doc-body,*/
#dtk-footernav .ft,
#mantle2 .bd form,
#search fieldset,
#searchother_e2e,
#weatherpreview .forcast div,
#y-answers-badge-0 *,
#yan-answers .hd,
#yan-categories li,
#yan-categories li.current,
#yan-community form div,
#yan-community form div div,
#yan-flags-matter,
#yan-question-tools li ul li a,
#yan-question-tools li ul li a:hover,
#yan-text-bubble .bd div,
#yan-text-bubble .bd span,
#yan-yamster-flag,
#yan-yamster-flag .ft,
#ynnav li div,
#ypfl-masthead input,

body input.ygrp-button,
dl.formfields dt,
form input.inactive,
h2,
input.active,
p.more-link,

/* Inbox Components */
[class="leftcap"],
[class="rightcap"],

[class="active"],
[class="adaptive"],
[class="artists"],
[class="answer low-rating hidden"],
[class="badge"],
[class='bbox'],
[class="best"],
[class="comment_submit suggestion"],
[class="current"],
[class="down"],
[class="first"],
[class="folderNameElem"],
[class="hd"],
[class="headaction"],
[class="inactive"],
[class="invite-wrap"],
[class="launch last"],
[class="list-action-top"],
[class="marketing-ad-mod"],
[class="mastheadbd"],

[class="paneHeader compHeader"],
[class="papreviewdiv"],

[class="picture"],
[class="promo-info"],
[class="scNewContactContainer"],

[class="tl"],

[class='user-card'],
[class='user-card-shadow'],

[class="y-answer y-answer-list"],
[class="yastblmodule"],
[class="yfbfbitem"],
[class='yschalrtz'],
[class="yschbbox"],

[id="0_composeFont_sample"],
[id="busyLoadingWidget"],
[id="doc"],
[id="dtk-footernav"],
[id="footer"],
[id="loadStatusText"],
[id="locallist"],
[id="localsubheader"],
[id="main-nav"],
[id="pg"],
[id="promo-ribbon"],
[id="results"],
[id="search"],
[id="searchother"],
[id="searchother_e2e"],
[id="searchsubmit"],
[id="station-bd"],
[id="station-ft"],
[id="station-hd"],
[id="tabs2previewdiv"],
[id="trough-1"],

/*[id="ymgl-profile"]*/

 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 background-color: #010 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 border: 1px !important;
 border-color: #020 !important;
 font-weight: normal !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* I See A Red Door */
[class="action abuse"],
[class="action default-lgray"],
[class="flag-abuse"]
 {
 background-color: #600 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Black Borders */
/* User Profile Attributes */
#contact-list ul li.active,
#up-member-email p,
#user-profile-right p em,
#welcomeNewsUnit,
#welcomePageContainer div,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #content,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search p,
#y-ks-whole-page,
#yan-answer-cta.mod .bd,
#yan-answers .bd,

 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 background-color: #000 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 border-color: #030 !important;
 font-weight: normal !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Yahoo! Headers */

/* Panel Borders */
#pabd { background-color: #474 !important }


[class="alt-button"] button, input[type="reset"],
input[type="button"], input[type="submit"]
{
 color:#bbb !important;
 background-color: #093 !important;
}

[type="cancel"] { background-color: #f90 !important }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Screen Dimensions */
/*1050*/
#y-ks-whole-page,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search,
#yan
 {
 width:1050px !important;
 }

/* 960 */
/* #y-body-green-knowledge-search #content #just-middle, */
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #content #just-middle
 {
 width: 960px !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* 755 */
#yan-answers,
#yan-answers h2,
#yan-content,
#yan-question,
#yan-question .subject,
#yan-question-tools,

.answer,
.answer util ul,
.qa-container,

dl.formfields dd,
dl.formfields dd div,
dl.formfields dd textarea,

[class="subject"]
 {
 width: 755px !important;
 }

/* 730 */
.answer.best,
.answer.best h2,
#yan-question h2,
#yan-question .hd
 {
 width: 730px !important;
 }

/* 715 */
#y-ks-header-container,
#ks-inline-search-container,
#yan-answers .hd,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #content #middle,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #content-right #middle,
#yan-question .additional-details,
#yan-question h2 .additional-details,
.answer-rating dd.desc,
.qa-container .content,
.qa-container div.reference,
.question-listing,
.utils-container
 {
 width: 715px !important;
 }


.question-listing .dotted-line,
.question-results .dotted-line
 {
 width: 710px !important;
 }


/* 700 */
#yan main .qa-container
 {
 width: 700px !important;
 }

/* 535 */
.inline-search-wrapper input.textbox
 {
 width: 535px !important;
 }

/* 225 */
.taxonomy-select
 {
 width: 225px !important;
 }

/* Answers Input Box */
[id='textarea2']
 {
 height: 300px !important;
 }

[id='moreCommentsContainer'] textarea,
[id='refer']
 {
 height: 150px !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* AutoMargins */
#boa,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #user-profile {
margin-left: auto !important;
margin-right: auto !important;
}


/* Dead Weight */
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #content #just-middle .connections_left
 {
 float: none !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/* Orphans */
/*
[id="ks-user-profile-peeps"],
*/

/* All ends here!*/
}
